title: On Geometric Connections of Embedded and Quotient Geometries in Riemannian Fixed-rank Matrix Optimization. (arXiv:2110.12121v2 [math.OC] UPDATED)
abstract: In this paper, we propose a general procedure for establishing the geometric landscape connections of a Riemannian optimization problem under the embedded and quotient geometries. By applying the general procedure to the fixed-rank positive semidefinite (PSD) and general matrix optimization, we establish an exact Riemannian gradient connection under two geometries at every point on the manifold and sandwich inequalities between the spectra of Riemannian Hessians at Riemannian first-order stationary points (FOSPs). These results immediately imply an equivalence on the sets of Riemannian FOSPs, Riemannian second-order stationary points (SOSPs), and strict saddles of fixed-rank matrix optimization under the embedded and the quotient geometries. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first geometric landscape connection between the embedded and the quotient geometries for fixed-rank matrix optimization and it provides a concrete example of how these two geometries are connected in Riema

translated_title: 关于黎曼固定秩矩阵优化中嵌入几何和商几何的几何联系
translated_abstract: 本文提出了一种建立黎曼优化问题的嵌入和商几何的几何景观联系的通用程序。通过将通用程序应用于固定秩正定半定（PSD）矩阵和一般矩阵优化，我们在流形上每一点都建立了两种几何下的精确黎曼梯度连接，并在黎曼一阶稳定点（FOSP）处的黎曼黑塞矩阵的谱之间建立了夹杂不等式。这些结果立即暗示固定秩矩阵优化在嵌入几何和商几何下黎曼FOSP集，黎曼二阶稳定点（SOSP）集和严格鞍点集的等同。据我们所知，这是固定秩矩阵优化中嵌入和商几何的首个几何景观联系，并提供了这两种几何在黎曼优化中如何联系的具体示例。
tldr: 本文提出了一种建立黎曼优化问题的嵌入和商几何的几何景观联系的通用程序，应用于固定秩矩阵优化可以在黎曼FOSP集、SOSP集和严格鞍点集上建立等同。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a general procedure for establishing geometric landscape connections of a Riemannian optimization problem under embedded and quotient geometries. By applying the procedure to fixed-rank positive semidefinite and general matrix optimization, the paper establishes an exact Riemannian gradient connection and sandwich inequalities, showing an equivalence on sets of Riemannian stationary points and strict saddles of fixed-rank matrix optimization under the two geometries. This is the first such geometric landscape connection and provides a concrete example of the connectedness of these two geometries in Riemannian optimization.
